## Reduce Use of Shared Physical Assets & Increase Social Distancing
Limit customer exposure to shared physical assets (phones, menus, brochures, etc.) and replace face-to-face interactions with digital experiences.
## Create Highly-Personalized & Brand Differentiated Customer Experiences
Leverage data and real-time multi-platform messaging to create meaningful interactions throughout the entire customer journey.
## Optimize Tedious Processes & Improve Service Recovery
Manage multiple conversations across all messaging channels through automation, reduce and recover from negative guest experiences by automatically deploying service recovery workflows with key integrations.
## Increase Customer Satisfaction, Generate Better Reviews & Drive Brand Loyalty
Deploy quick surveys to ask how your customers are doing and encourage them to share positive reviews. Route and escalate dissatisfied customers to service recovery team. Online reviews are the first experience prospects have with your brand.
